pageProduct.name: Organic Care Kids 3in1 Shampoo Conditioner Body Wash Fruit Blast 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OC Kids 3in1 Conditioning Shampoo & Body Wash Fruit Blast has plant derived ingredients. Contains no petrochemical cleansers, sles, als or parabens to leave your little one clean & soft.

OC Kids 3in1 Conditioning Shampoo & Body Wash
Feel happy & fresh with apple extract & wheat germ oil, to leave your little one squeaky clean & soft.

- Not tested on animals.

Product Claims: Not tested on animals. No petrochemical cleansers, sles, als or parabens.

Size: 400mL

Scent: Fruit Blast

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water, Coco-Glucoside*, Sodium Coco-Sulfate*, Glycerin*, Lauryl Lactyl Lactate*, Glyceryl Oleate*, Polyquaternium-10*, Fragrance, Triticum, Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Panthenol, Citric Acid*, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate*.
*Plant derived.

Directions

Apply to wet hair, form a gentle lather then rinse. Apply to a moist puff or wash cloth & gently lather all over body then rinse.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle made from 100% recycled pet.
Bottle. Cap. arl.org.au.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
